item.title: Ticket #3115 (tinymce image insertion/edit tool should have a class and a style box) created
item.dc:creator: RuddO
item.description:
How hard would it be to add this? I'm planning to do this for a customer, but I'd like it to be in WP mainline. I want to hear your expert opinion, guys, because I think this would be very beneficial for the users of the rich text post editor.

basically besides just alignment, the popup box should also have a CSS classes text box and a CSS style text box.

Give me pointers with determining what more or less it would take, I'll do it, and charge my customer, and roll it in into WP mainline. Whaddya think?

item.title: Changeset [4174]: timer_stop() wanted to be near timer_start().
item.dc:creator: ryan
item.description: timer_stop() wanted to be near timer_start().

item.title: Ticket #3099 (AJAX Responsiveness) updated
item.dc:creator: mdawaffe
item.description:
3099c.diff

  1. When adding, clear froms right away. Restore as necessary.
  2. If user tries to navigate away from page before data is sent, warn with a confirmation dialog. Does not work in Opera (others?) since requires .onbeforeunload. Could write annoying loop with .onunload, but that seems hideous. Thoughts? Throbbers or GMail-like "Loading..." could be implemented as well.
  3. Double posting shouldn't be a problem now that we clear the form right away, but the feedback for this isn't great. Try it out.

Before Committing:

  1. Update version info in script-loader.
  2. svn mv wp-admin/list-manipulation-js.php wp-includes/js/list-manipulation-js.php, delete contents of that file, and overwrite with patch.
